title: Conduct a Port Security Drill
description: The Port Facility Security Officer (PFSO) needs to conduct a scheduled drill simulating an unauthorized access attempt.

tasks.description: Plan the drill scenario, objectives, and participants.
tasks.expected_outcome: PFSO creates a drill plan outlining the scenario and what will be tested.

tasks.description: Initiate the drill by notifying the control room and relevant security personnel.
tasks.expected_outcome: The drill is started, and all participants are aware it is a test.

tasks.description: Observe the response and document the outcomes, noting any areas for improvement.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PFSO creates a post-drill report summarizing performance and recommending corrective actions.
